pages.text: "A highly-advanced block capable of transmitting any practical resource across long distances and dimensions."$(p)The Quantum Entangloporter (QE) is a block that can wirelessly transfer contents, be it items, energy, fluids, etc. By default, it's auto-eject transfer rate is equivalent to the ultimate variant of the specific

substance. For example, say you want to transfer chemicals, then it would auto-eject at a rate of 2,056mB/t.$(p)$(bold)Supported Upgrades:$()$(br)$(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_anchor)Anchor Upgrades$(/l) (1)

pages.title: Frequencies
pages.text: For two QE's to connect, they have to be set to the same frequency. Once they have been set to the same frequency, they share the same inventory contents.
